caracteristicas.titulo: The best option for his event
caracteristicas.bajada: San Martín de los Andes - Event Venue

item-3.detalle: “Meeting rooms with capacity up to 250 people”

redes.texto: San Martín de los Andes Bureau

nosotros.texto-1: San Martín de los Andes Bureau s a non-profit association, made up of entrepreneurs and professionals linked to the field of meetings tourism, of a Private - Public nature.
nosotros.texto-2: The merger between the event and San Martin de los Andes Bureau is the operational synergy necessary to ensure success. It promotes the sustainability of the destination and activates the economy of the city.
nosotros.texto-3: Our associates are committed to providing quality services, always seeking to satisfy the needs of those who visit us, becoming their strategic allies.
nosotros.textoM-1: Position San Martin de los Andes as the destination for the realization of high quality events.
nosotros.textoM-2: Maximize the experience of our visitors in the satisfaction of the services received from all suppliers and associated professionals, contributing to the social and cultural economic development of the destination.
nosotros.textoV-1: Promote San Martin de los Andes as the destination for the organization of congresses, conventions, fairs and incentive trips. Create the conditions for our associates to receive continuous training to generate a destination with a high degree of satisfaction.
nosotros.textoV-2: To be an engine in the awareness of the care of the environment, social and business social responsibility to protect the natural beauties that surround us.

sma.titulo: Why San Martin de los Andes
sma.texto-1: San Martin de los Andes is located in a valley within the Lanín National Park, surrounded by mountains with thick forests and deep glacial lakes. It is located south of the Province of Neuquén, and has a local airport located a few minutes. It has a cordilleran architecture with characteristics of the area.
sma.texto-2: It is a safe, quiet and friendly city for visitors. It has an exquisite cuisine, excellent quality accommodation in its different categories and alternatives for walks, excursions, activities before and after events.
sma.texto-3: All this makes it an original and particular venue for congresses, conventions, incentives, corporate and sports, accompanied by a unique landscape. The months of events are: March - April - May - June - October - September - November. Conference Capacity: 250

socios.bajada: San Martín de los Andes - Patagonia Argentina

contacto.titulo-2: in San Martín de los Andes

asociarse.texto-1: San Martin de los Andes Bureau promotes and promotes the city as a venue for meetings tourism for events, congresses, conventions, fairs, exhibitions, incentive tourism, etc. Seeking to end the seasonality of leisure tourism. Magnifying the use of all the infrastructure and services during the 12 months of the year.
asociarse.texto-2: Partnering is wanting to belong to a group of professionals who work for the destination, with a common goal that is San Martin de los Andes meeting tourism.
asociarse.textoSub-1: Project your business to meeting tourism.
asociarse.textoSub-2: Generates brand presence in social networks through the buerau logo, which certifies the quality of its services.
asociarse.textoSub-3: Generates brand presence in national and international fairs.
asociarse.textoSub-5: Technical and informative advice about the infrastructure and services of the city.
asociarse.textoSub-6: Development of meetings between the associates to generate synergy in the work for events.
asociarse.textoSub-7: It generates competitive advantages that directly impact the billing in the months considered low.
asociarse.textoSub-8: Develop a Corporate Responsibility program that brings together all the associates.

gracias.bajada: Soon we will contact you for your query
gracias.base: San Martín de los Andes Bureau
